name: part_009
file: tmp_【公式】3Dアニメ『魔法少女ホロウィッチ！THE STAGE 〜TRICK or MAGIC！〜』本編 [_qpO8vi9fpA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Ending credits featuring the theme song performed by the main cast.
Post-credits promotional slides and a thank-you message to the viewers.

subtitles.english: Magic that begins to sparkle and shine
Even if you try your hardest

subtitles.original: 上手くいかない日の方が　多く感じちゃったりするよね
subtitles.english: You might feel like there are more days when things don't go right

subtitles.original: さあ、不安かな？　悲しみも
subtitles.english: Now, are you feeling anxious? And sadness too?

subtitles.original: 抱えないで一人じゃない
subtitles.english: Don't carry it alone, you're not by yourself

subtitles.original: 希望の種を　明日に撒いたら
subtitles.english: If you sow the seeds of hope for tomorrow

subtitles.original: 一番に輝く綺麗な花が咲くよ
subtitles.english: The most brilliant and beautiful flower will bloom

subtitles.original: 夢を　歌を　魔法に乗せて
subtitles.english: Dreams and songs, carried on magic

subtitles.original: 何度も立ち上がる　君と一緒に進んでいく
subtitles.english: Standing up again and again, I'll move forward with you

subtitles.original: 夢は　夢は　まだ終わらない
subtitles.english: The dream, the dream, it's not over yet

subtitles.original: 何度だって笑って　もう一回歩き始めよう
subtitles.english: Laugh as many times as it takes, let's start walking once more

subtitles.original: ホロウィッチ　おはよう　夢の先へ
subtitles.english: HoloWitch, good morning, to the future beyond the dream

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました
